title: Chapter 2047 - 2047 Explode Your Face Again! (2)
body:
Chapter 2047 - 2047 Explode Your Face Again! (2)

2047 Explode Your Face Again! (2)

“Screech!”

The world outside the mirror, that stopped all its changes after the Demonic Emperor Black Dragon and the winged black demon Berserk Giant stopped their attacks, began its Transformation again.

The boundary between the Outer Island, that intangible membrane, gradually disappeared under the crazy output from the Divine Oracle’s energy movement.

“Crack!”

At a certain moment, in the ruins of the First Hall of Sins, someone discovered that a ghostly beast’s claw had swept across his face. He had only been frightened before, but this time, it actually left a slight scratch on his face and it bled.

“Ah!”

“They’re coming, they’re coming!”

This discovery made one’s hair stand on end.

Their strength could already seep through a little?

Didn’t this mean that the Outer Island’s seal had cracked and connection was within sight.

“Xu Xiashou, answer me!”

Yan Wuse decided to ignore what was in front of him.

He could not withstand so many energy attacks, so he could only choose to capture the leader first. He rushed over and pointed at the Divine Oracle Number Two.

“What answer do you want? You want me to tell you how I learned the Divine Secret?”

Xu Xiaoshou’s arrogant laughter came out from the giant’s body. “I was born extraordinary, and my bloodline was gifted. How can a mortal compare to me?”

“Bullshit!” Yan Wuse spat.

“Ha ha, I actually can’t hide it from you. Forget it. I’ll tell you…” Xu Xiaoshou paused for a moment and said seriously.

“Headless Yan, do you know about Project Zero?”

“I think that with your status, you are not qualified to come into contact with this level. However, my Divine Secret came from Project Zero.”

Project Zero?

Yan Wuse was stunned.

Everyone was stunned too.

The first thing they thought of was Number Two, that was the name of the Divine Oracle.

“What are you talking about?” Yan Wuse’s gaze froze.

“I’ll tell you!” Xu Xiaoshou laughed as he launched his attack. “You’d better stop now. My Divine Secret was taught by my dear Hallmaster Dao!”

Dao…

Yan Wuse rushed up to the Divine Oracle, but at this moment, he was in a daze.

That’s right, other than Dao Qiongcang, who else knew about the Divine Secret?

No!

Xu Xiaoshou tried to trick them again!

This guy was trying to drive a wedge between the Holy Divine Palace?

At this moment, Yan Wuse could almost imagine the barrage of criticism from everyone on Abyss Island after they heard what Xu Xiaoshou said.

He paused and then angrily attacked.

“Ultimate Cutting Blade!”

He clasped his palms together toward the left, and the sky over the Abyss Island suddenly darkened.

Tens of thousands of light shadows suddenly gathered and condensed into a long, blazing blade of light in Yan Wuse’s hand.

Yan Wuse’s hands held the long blade of light that was as thin as a cicada’s wings, but it was as if he dragged along the heaviest object in the world.

He aimed it at the position below the Divine Oracle’s neck, that was where Xu Xiaoshou was seated in the cabin, and slashed at the air.

Whoosh!

The Path Principles shattered and the space was cut open.

The long blade of light emitted a black saber shadow. With a clang, it struck the Divine Oracle, who did not dodge his attack at all.

The world fell silent.

Xu Xiaoshou could not stand the fact that everyone’s eyes were fixated on the second true body and he itched to get a wave of… Yes, a sense of existence.

Hence, he froze the time and temporarily stopped all the Transformation in the battle.

“Why didn’t you dodge such a powerful attack from Yan Wuse?” On the dragon’s head, Xu Xiaoshou placed his hands behind his back and raised his chin slightly.

Inside the cabin of the Divine Oracle, the second true body gritted his teeth desperately, but he could only speak in embarrassment. “Because I was not afraid.”

“Why not?”

“I said I was not afraid, so I’m not afraid.”

Yan Wuse’s face turned green with anger!

He finally broke through the shackles of the time freeze and the huge force completely slashed away at Divine Oracle.

However, how could the second true body, who had the time to chat and play, not avoid the attack?

He just didn’t want to!

“Defense Mode.” The second true body’s strange mechanical voice sounded.

After a short pause, the sound stopped and quickly connected, and everyone’s thoughts returned.

Yan Wuse’s Ultimate Cutting Blade, was a Saint Martial Arts sacred weapon and renowned for its extreme cutting power. However, it was blocked by the Divine Oracle’s defense mode for a moment.

At this moment, the Divine Oracle’s chest split open, and the Divine Path Principles spewed out and formed a net.

“Energy Binding Web.”

As soon as the net was unleashed, an energy attack like the Ultimate Cutting Blade was pulled away on the spot and trapped inside the Divine Oracle.

A pop sound was heard.

The Divine Oracle shrank back to its normal human form and almost came face-to-face with Yan Wuse.

At this moment, Yan Wuse could almost smell the disgusting stench of Xu Xiaoshou’s body from the Divine Oracle’s mouth.

“Headless Yan, remember.”

“This is the second time, but not the last.”

Before anyone could react, there was a loud bang.

The energy impact Transformation from the Ultimate Cutting Blade shattered the Spiritual Gods Ruler Form on the spot and blew up Yan Wuse’s head again.

“Oh my God…”

When they saw how Elder Yan’s headless body flew backward from the impact, the Abyss Island exploded in circles.

All the spectators on the island felt their scalps go numb, and they could hardly control the shock in their hearts.

Yan Wuse’s head was blown up again!

Headless Yan – it really came true!

Xu Xiaoshou’s reaction speed was boosted by the Divine Oracle.

Furthermore, with the Divine Oracle’s ability, Yan Wuse failed to face the Transformation in the battle situation and could not accept that one of his own people had become the enemy…

Only one strike and it worked!

What was even more ridiculous was that before this attack, the other Xu Xiaoshou seated on the dragon’s head had even teased everyone.

He even controlled time to give himself a sense of existence.

Yan Wuse, on the other hand, became a supporting character in this self-directed drama. He was like a toy that could be manipulated by the other party.
